notes.note: istio/istio: authorization bypass when using AUTO_PASSTHROUGH

reference.description: bz#1955396: CVE-2021-31921 istio/istio: authorization bypass when using AUTO_PASSTHROUGH

remediation.description:
The OpenShift Service Mesh release notes provide information on the features and known issues:
https://docs.openshift.com/container-platform/4.7/service_mesh/v2x/servicemesh-release-notes.html

acknowledgment.description: Red Hat would like to thank the Istio Product Security Working Group for reporting this issue.

note:
An update for servicemesh is now available for OpenShift Service Mesh 2.0.
Red Hat Product Security has rated this update as having a security impact of Important. A Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) base score, which gives a detailed severity rating, is available for each vulnerability from the CVE link(s) in the References section.

Red Hat OpenShift Service Mesh is Red Hat's distribution of the Istio service mesh project, tailored for installation into an on-premise OpenShift Container Platform installation.
Security Fix(es):
* istio/istio: authorization bypass when using AUTO_PASSTHROUGH (CVE-2021-31921)
For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.
